attributes.action: Abandon plans to place Folic Acid in all Bread Flour
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Food Standards Agency is proposing to advise the Government to add folic acid to all bread flour (both brown and white), ostensibly to prevent babies from being born with spina bifida.

As there are many other ways to achieve normal doses of folic acid within our bodies without 'Mass Medication', we ask that all plans to input this substance into our food are abandoned, as we simply do not know the long-term effects of this, or any other adulteration of our bread supplies!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
